item.title: RusMap v2.54.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 14, 2025

RusMap v2.54.1 ETS2

Project “RusMap” – Global modification for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2. This modification has been developed since 2014 and covers the European part of Russia and the Republic of Belarus. The following regions are represented in Russia: In the north – Moscow, Leningrad, Tver, Novgorod, Pskov, Murmansk and the Republic of Karelia. In the west – Kaluga, Bryansk, Smolensk, Tula, Oryol, Kursk, Belgorod. In the south – Voronezh, Tambov, Penza, Lipetsk, Saratov and Volgograd regions. In the Republic of Belarus, six regions are represented: Minsk, Vitebsk, Mogilev, Gomel, Grodno and Brest regions.
The map is compatible with other popular projects such as ProMods, Roextended Map, SibirMap, Southern Region Map, Volga Map and many other modifications.

Cities in Russia:
Lyuban, Kirovsk, Bryansk, Valdai, Velikiye Luki, Veliky Novgorod, Velizh, Volokolamsk, Vyshny Volochok, Vyazma, Kaluga, Klin, Moscow, Nevel, Obninsk, Ostashkov, Porkhov, Rzhev, Roslavl, Smolensk, Tver, Kholm, Yukhnov, Tula, Kursk, Orel, Voronezh, Kolomna, Tambov, Borisoglebsk, Volgograd, Volzhsky, Krasnoslobodsk, Saratov, Engels, Lodeynoye Pole, Petrozavodsk, Medvezhyegorsk, Kem, Zelenoborsky, Sortavala, Priozersk, Suoyarvi, Tosno, Razmetelyevo, Murmansk, Monchegorsk, Kandalaksha, Segezha, Alakurtti, Kolpino, Kola, Khimki, Vitino.

Cities in the Republic of Belarus:
Cities in the Republic of Belarus: Baranovichi, Bobruisk, Brest, Vitebsk, Gomel, Minsk, Mogilev, Mozyr, Mstislavl, Orsha, Pinsk, Slutsk, Lida, Grodno, Slonim, Volkovysk, Polatsk, Glubokoe.

Roads in Russia:
M11, P208, P209, 86K-3, A101, A108, A111, A116, A119, A120, A123, A141, A144, A240, E20, M2, M4, M3, M5, M9, M10, M20, P21, P39, P47, P48, P50, P51, P57, P87, P89, P108, P115, P132, P228, P-236, P-298.

Roads in the Republic of Belarus:
M2, M4, M5, M8, M10, M11, P4, P15, P17, P21, P23, P26, P43, P96, P112.

Supported game versions:
Game version: 1.54 + DLC Going East! + DLC Scandinavia + DLC “Beyond the Baltic Sea” + DLC “Italia” + DLC “Vive la France” + DLC “Road to the Black Sea” + DLC “Iberia + DLC West Balkans”

List of changes in version 2.54.1:
The city of Moscow has been completed. New companies have been added, the M2 junction has been added, the M4 junction has been rebuilt.
Minor changes to the M2, M4, R-21 highways.
Added the Vitino oil depot.
Many textures and models have been updated and optimized.
Fixed graphic and visual errors in different parts of the map.
Many other changes.

Installation procedure:
1. Unzip the downloaded file using the 7zip archiver.
2. Place all unpacked files in the My Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod folder.
3. Connect all files in the mod manager.

Compatibility with other projects:
ProMods Map
Roextended Map
SibirMap 2.0 Map
Southern Region Map
Volga Map

Credits: SCS Software aldimator dimon_26 - author of the north Schumi, Sergey061, Schura774 - support and development of the project. 10AVOID - author of SZM Addon Gricko, geohotin, klipstoeun8839, Jazzycat, DENLOG, Schumi - new models. CsewS, desirent, Igor-Govorukhin - testing the map Jazzycat - help in building the map, updating companies, new models, as well as help in building the Republic of Belarus. Vladzz-G - correction of registration numbers. paokkerkir - help with translation into Greek. wik412 - localization of cities. Many thanks to everyone who took part in the construction of the map.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania R650 Leo Robertz KG+Trailer v3.0 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 14, 2025

Scania R650 Leo Robertz KG+Trailer v3.0 1.54 ETS2

Includes:
Normal roof cab
6×2 BDF chassis
DC16 650 Openpipe engine
Eclusive interior
Custom salon
Full Standalone
Full Lightmask
Full animation
RED interior light as accessory
Support SiSL’s Mega Pack
Personal wheels
Has interior tuning
Multimedia works with a button, it must be specified in the game settings

Game version: 1.54

Credits: PDT

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Freightliner Coronado SD v2.1 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 14, 2025

Freightliner Coronado SD v2.1 1.54 ATS

Changelog v2.1
Added new cabin DayCab
Added new chassis, including 4×2
Added new hoods (132 and 122sba) and its accessories
Added new backwall without window for 70 inch cabins.
Added new guards for headlights
Added new grilles
Added hood deflectors
Added new hood mirrors
Added new front fenders extensions
Added new sunvisors
Added new aero panels under the cabin
Added new rear fenders
Added new custom trailer cables connectors
Current version of the mod:

Mod includes
High-quality exterior model
High-quality interior model
Wide range of chassis variants
4 Cabins
Different hood options (122 and 132 inch)
SBA chassis variant
10 colours of each interior element
Compatibility with SISL’s Mega Pack and DLC Cabin Accessories
Engines and Sounds by Kriechbaum

Credits: Varius

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 14, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth K Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.1 ATS

This is a Kenworth Truck Skins Pack for the K Series Trucks of the Kenworth K100 From the Stream Workshop plus K200 RTA Paided Mod Truck , K108 RTA Mods Paid Mod Truck & K104 Modded Truck
and has some Real Life Trucking Companys and Brands and much more high Deatailing and build using Mod Studio 2 all skins in the pack are copyright owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021 & Australia Worldwide Entertainment You Tube channel and is only for entertainment use.

v1.0 (Launch Release)
The Launch edition of the pack has K100/K104/108 & K200 Skins in the pack

v1.1 (Update May 2025)
This update bring the pack in line with the update to 1.54 of ATS plus adds 5 New K108 Skins & 7 New K200RTA/Paboy Skins plus we have fixed all 41 K100 Overfloater Skins to now work with the updated Steam Workshop edition pack has been updated for 1.54 of ATS.

List of Skins are listed below Ones that are shown (NEW) are been added to the latest Update to the Mod.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: MAN TGX E5 v2.3 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 14, 2025

MAN TGX E5 v2.3 ETS2

Version 2.3:
– Work and tested for 1.54 game version

– 2 Cabin Options: XLX, XXL
– 2 Chassis Options: 4×2, 4×2 Low Deck
– 16 Engine Options: 330 – 640 hp
– 9 Transmission Options
– 8 Interior Options
– 6 Skin Options
– 49 Steering Wheel Options
– 9 Paintjob Options
– Many Tuning Options

Credits: CRG, Scania Production

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
